text: Aaron William Cameron (born September 16, 1972), known professionally as Aaron Phypers, is a Canadian-born American businessman. He is best known for his appearances on the Bravo reality television series The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. == Early life == Aaron William Cameron was born in Toronto, Ontario, Canada on September 16, 1972. Phypers graduated from the University of Southern California, a private research university in Los Angeles, California. == Career == Phypers has worked in frequent medicine since 1995. He founded and runs a healing center, Quantum 360. The center was founded in Canada and is based in Malibu, California. Phypers made his debut as an actor on June 22, 2009, with the role of Business Man on the short film The Curiosity of Penny Parker. He was credited as Aaron Phyphers. Phypers appeared as First Officer Monreal on an episode of the Discovery Channel documentary television program Air Crash Investigation. His episode was broadcast on December 23, 2009. Phypers appeared as Brett in the 2011 short film The Leap. Phypers appeared on the ninth and 10th season of the Bravo reality television series The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills in 2019 and 2020. He made a guest appearance on the 17th episode in the 13th season. The episode was broadcast on February 21, 2024. Phypers appeared on two episode of the CBS soap opera The Bold and the Beautiful in 2020, amid the COVID-19 pandemic. He portrayed Ridge Forrester Sr.'s body double in two love scenes with his wife, Denise. His debut episode was broadcast on 13 August. His second, and final, episode was broadcast on 14 August. Phypers will appear on the E! reality television series Denise Richards and the Wild Things. The series is set to air in 2025. == Personal life == Phypers married Nicollette Sheridan, an English-born American actress, on December 12, 2015. They separated on June 19, 2016, after six months of marriage, with Sheridan filing for divorce on July 15, citing irreconcilable differences. Their divorce was finalized on August 21, 2018. Phypers began dating Denise Richards, an American actress, in December 2017, prior to the finalization of his divorce from Sheridan. The couple were engaged for less than 48 hours and were married at the Cypress Sea Cove in Malibu, California on September 8, 2018. He gained three stepdaughters, including Sami Sheen and Lola Sheen, the daughters of Charlie Sheen, an actor. Their wedding was featured on the Bravo reality television series The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. On May 10, 2019, Richards announced that Phypers was adopting her youngest daughter, Eloise Joni. Eloise has a rare chromosomal disorder, Chromosome 8, Monosomy 8p, which affects her speech. Phypers resides in Southern California. Phypers and Richards's car was shot at during an apparent road rage incident in Los Angeles on November 14, 2022. They were unharmed. == Filmography == Year Title Role Notes Ref. 2009 The Curiosity of Penny Parker Business Man Credited as; Aaron Phyphers Air Crash Investigation First Officer Monreal Episode: "Frozen in Flight" 2011 The Leap Brett 2019â€“2020, 2024 The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills Himself 29 episodes 2020 The Bold and the Beautiful Ridge Forrester Sr.'s body double 2 episodes TBA Denise Richards and the Wild Things Himself In production == References == Category:1972 births Category:Living people
